name: Monster Slash
description:
A fun FPS I created, but how many monsters can you kill? 
There are in total 4 different types of enemies as well as 4 different types of weapons that can spawn in random locations on the map, the aim of the game is to beat your highscore and discover the last enemy!

So if you want to support me consider buying the game!

https://www.youtube.com/c/BuildAnything/

I unfortunately cannot guarantee how well the game will run on your device, I tested it on my laptop and it ran perfectly
